fields.name: resourceType
fields.description: The type of the FHIR resource.

fields.name: clinicalStatus
fields.description: The clinical status of the condition.
fields.note:
• A clinicalStatus must always be provided while creating a Condition.
  • Only the active code is supported when the category is encounter-diagnosis.

fields.name: verificationStatus
fields.description: The verification status to support or decline the clinical status of the condition or diagnosis.
fields.note: verificationStatus codes of entered-in-error and refuted are not supported during Condition creates.

fields.name: category
fields.description: A category assigned to the condition.
fields.note:
• Only a single category may be provided.
  • Category codes problem-list-item and encounter-diagnosis are supported.
  • Classification codes are not supported.

binding.description: A category assigned to the condition.
binding.note:
• Category codes encounter-diagnosis, problem-list-item and health-concern are supported for search and retrieve functionality.
  • Classification codes Medical, Patient Stated, Nursing and Nutrition are supported for search and retrieve functionality.

fields.name: severity
fields.description: A subjective assessment of the severity of the condition as evaluated by the clinician.

binding.description: A subjective assessment of the severity of the condition as evaluated by the clinician.

fields.name: code
fields.description: Identification of the condition, problem or diagnosis.

binding.description: Identification of the condition, problem or diagnosis.

fields.name: subject
fields.description: Indicates the patient who the condition record is associated with.
fields.note: subject must be a reference to a Patient.

fields.name: encounter
fields.description: Encounter during which the condition was first asserted.
fields.note:
• encounter must be a reference to an Encounter.
  • encounter is required when the condition category code is encounter-diagnosis.

fields.name: onset[x]
fields.description: Estimated or actual date or date-time the condition began, in the opinion of the clinician.
fields.note:
• Only a type of dateTime is supported.
  • The dateTime is converted to a GMT date.

fields.name: abatement[x]
fields.description: The date or estimated date that the condition resolved or went into remission.
fields.note: abatementDateTime is not supported for Conditions with a category of encounter-diagnosis.

fields.name: note
fields.description: Additional information about the Condition. This is a general notes/comments entry for description of the Condition, its diagnosis and prognosis.
